overview: Love Costs Everything maps the history of Christian persecution from  the first Christian martyrs to seven present-day stories of faith that  knows no price. In the face of persecution, these followers of Christ  fear compromise more than death itself.  Filmed in Iraq, Columbia, India, Egypt, France and the United States, this  feature-length documentary includes commentary from United States  Congressmen, foreign government officials, religious leaders and  scholars.
title: Love Costs Everything
